## Intro

::: {.flashcard-front}
This is an example of using the `flashcards` plugin in a reveal.js presentation. 

Press the `q` key (by default) to flip a flashcard slide. You can you can override the default keybinding by setting the `key` option in the YAML header.
:::

:::{.flashcard-back}
Nicely done! Let's go over some geography flashcards to see how this looks.
:::
